subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Mark Reynolds hit a tiebreaking single in the 10th inning, and the Indians, who have not lost any of their last seven series, won at Detroit, 4-3.
snippet: Pinch-hitter Mark Reynolds hit a tiebreaking single in the 10th inning, and the Indians, who have not lost any of their last seven series, won at Detroit, 4-3.
